description:
It had been an interesting morning. I had just met Liam and I was instantly taken with his charm.

We chatted for a minute and then I said, "OK let's get you naked so we can check out the merchandise!"

He thought that was hilarious. "Well, OK," he said.

I took him into the back room and told him I'd give him a minute.

I heard some rustling and then a minute later: "Excuse me... ya'll can come in now if you'd like..."

There's no doubt that Liam is a shy, polite, southern guy!

I walked in and he was standing there butt-ass naked. Beefy, a little hairy, and a cute smile on his face!

He was excited to get started and it didn't take him long to get hard.

After a bit of filming we took a quick breather. He was still hard. He definitely likes to show off!

"How am I doing?" he asked politely.

"Really good," I told him. "Are you having fun?"

"Yup," he said. "This is a lot more fun than I thought it would be!"
title: Liam
